name: International Conference on Mechanical Automation and Engineering Materials
content: International Conference on Mechanical Automation and Engineering Materials (MAEM 2022) will be held in Kunming, China from June 18 to 20, 2022\. MAEM 2022 aims to promote academic exchanges and cooperation in the field of mechanical automation and engineering materials. This conference is dedicated to provide an efficient exchange platform for experts and scholars at home and abroad engaged in related fields to share experiences of various countries innovative ideas and different technologies.
